tour_uzbekistan.title: UZBEKISTAN & THE SILK ROAD
tour_uzbekistan.overview: JOURNEY THROUGH THE HEART OF CENTRAL ASIA AND DISCOVER UZBEKISTAN, WITH ITS RICH HISTORY AND CONNECTION TO THE FAMOUS SILK ROAD. EVERY STEP REVEALS CULTURAL CONNECTIONS WITH THE PAST, AND YOU WILL EXPERIENCE A HISTORICAL THEATRICAL PERFORMANCE.

1.title: UK To Tashkent
1.description: Flight to Tashkent and overnight stay.

3.title: Tashkent - Khiva
3.description: Morning flight and explore Khiva’s old town.

4.title: Khiva - Bukhara
4.description: Drive through the desert to Bukhara.

5.title: Bukhara
5.description: Full day exploring Bukhara’s historical sites.

6.title: Bukhara
6.description: Free day to explore Bukhara at your pace.

8.title: Samarkand
8.description: Discover Registan Square and ancient sites.

10.title: Samarkand - Tashkent
10.description: Return to Tashkent and evening farewell.

solo_travel.title: THE TRUSTED EXPERTS FOR SOLO HOLIDAYS
solo_travel.description: SINCE 2000, WE’VE BEEN BRINGING PEOPLE TOGETHER FOR UNFORGETTABLE SOLO HOLIDAYS. FROM EXPLORING EXOTIC DESTINATIONS TO DISCOVERING HIDDEN GEMS CLOSER TO HOME, OUR TOURS ARE DESIGNED TO CREATE LASTING MEMORIES AND MEANINGFUL CONNECTIONS.

tips.title: SOLO TRAVEL TIPS
tips.description: DISCOVER OUR TOP TEN TIPS TO ENSURE YOUR SOLO ADVENTURE IS UNFORGETTABLE. FROM PLANNING AHEAD TO STAYING CONNECTED, OUR TIPS HELP YOU FEEL SAFE AND CONFIDENT WHILE EXPLORING THE WORLD.

last_minute.title: LAST-MINUTE TRIPS
last_minute.description: LOOKING FOR A SPONTANEOUS GETAWAY? EXPLORE OUR LAST-MINUTE TRIPS TO EUROPE AND WORLDWIDE DESTINATIONS. WHETHER YOU WANT SUNSHINE, CULTURE, OR ADVENTURE, OUR CURATED PACKAGES MAKE YOUR TIME WORTHWHILE. BOOK NOW AND PACK YOUR BAGS FOR AN UNFORGETTABLE EXPERIENCE.

india.title: INSPIRATIONAL INDIA
india.description: EXPERIENCE THE MAGIC OF INDIA WITH OUR SPECIAL ANNIVERSARY TOUR. FROM THE TAJ MAHAL TO VIBRANT MARKETS, IMMERSE YOURSELF IN THE HISTORY, CULTURE, AND COLORS OF THIS INCREDIBLE COUNTRY. LIMITED SPACES—DON’T MISS OUT.

beach_escapes.title: BEACH ESCAPES
beach_escapes.description: RELAX ON SANDY SHORES WITH OUR EXCLUSIVE BEACH ESCAPES TAILORED FOR SOLO TRAVELERS. ENJOY STUNNING VIEWS, COMFORTABLE STAYS, AND BALANCED ITINERARIES BETWEEN RELAXATION AND CULTURAL EXPERIENCES.

city_adventures.title: CITY ADVENTURES
city_adventures.description: EXPLORE ICONIC CITIES WORLDWIDE WITH EXPERT-GUIDED TOURS DESIGNED FOR SOLO TRAVELERS. DISCOVER HIDDEN GEMS, DELICIOUS CUISINE, AND MAKE NEW FRIENDS IN PLACES LIKE PARIS, TOKYO, AND MORE.

wildlife_safaris.title: WILDLIFE SAFARIS
wildlife_safaris.description: GET CLOSER TO NATURE WITH OUR GUIDED WILDLIFE SAFARIS. EXPERIENCE STUNNING LANDSCAPES, SPOT EXOTIC ANIMALS, AND LEARN FROM EXPERT GUIDES ON TRIPS DESIGNED FOR SOLO ADVENTURERS.

other_tours.title: BALKAN EXPLORER
other_tours.description: AN IN-DEPTH EXPLORATION OF FOUR COUNTRIES IN AN UNDISCOVERED CORNER OF EUROPE. VISIT COSMOPOLITAN CITIES AND TRAVEL THROUGH STUNNING NATURAL LANDSCAPES, DISCOVERING HISTORIC SITES AND VIBRANT CULTURE.

service.support_every_step: Here to support you every step of the way

newsletter.title: GET TRAVEL INSPIRATION & OFFERS TO YOUR INBOX

about.title: HOLIDAYS THAT LET YOU BE JUST YOU
about.paragraph1: On a Just You holiday, you're free to enjoy the experience. We're dedicated solo travel experts so we'll take care of everything else.
about.paragraph2: No worrying about where you have to be in the morning, or buying the right train ticket. It's time to just enjoy your chosen destination, relax and make friends with like-minded people.
about.paragraph3: With 25 years of experience in escorted touring specifically for solo travellers, and a Holiday Director on hand to craft your perfect trip, you will be free to do whatever feels... Just You.

balkan_explorer.title: BALKAN EXPLORER
balkan_explorer.description: An in-depth exploration of four countries in an undiscovered corner of Europe. Visit cosmopolitan cities and travel through stunning natural landscapes. You will spend time in some of the most famous cities in Eastern Europe, all of them having lots of historical sites, vibrant bars and restaurants for you to explore.

switzerland_railways.title: SWITZERLAND'S SCENIC RAILWAYS AND ALPINE WINTER WONDERS
switzerland_railways.description: Embark on an unforgettable Swiss winter adventure, combining elegant rail journeys with breathtaking Alpine scenery.

turkish_treasures.title: TURKISH TREASURES
turkish_treasures.description: Turkey dazzles your senses, from Istanbul's bustling Grand Bazaar with scents of spices to the incredible cave dwellings of Cappadocia and the shimmering tiles of the Blue Mosque – not to mention the delicious cuisine.
